title: Day 210 (Isaiah 49-53) - Year 2
itunes:title: Day 210 (Isaiah 49-53) - Year 2
description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! - Join our PATREON family for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Article: Forbidden Chapter of the Tanakh

- Video: "The Forbidden Chapter" of the Hebrew Bible - Isaiah 53

- Colossians 1:20

- Revelation 13:8

- Hebrews 12:12

- Book: Delighting in the Trinity* 

*This is an affiliate link. A small percentage of your purchase helps support The Bible Recap!

 

SOCIALS:

D-GROUP: The Bible Recap is brought to you by D-Group - an international network of discipleship and accountability groups that meet weekly in homes and churches: Find or start one near you today!
